mapper.sql: ID as id,menu_id as menuId,ROLE_ID as roleId
mapper.select: SELECT from role_function where role_id = #{roleId} and is_del = 0
SELECT from sp_role_function where role_id = #{roleId} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into role_function ( menu_id, role_id, is_del, create_date, update_date ) values
(#{item},#{roleId},0,NOW(),NOW())

insert into sp_role_function ( menu_id, role_id, is_del, create_date, update_date ) values
(#{item},#{roleId},0,NOW(),NOW())
